title: Quarterly deliveries miss street view
snippet: Deliveries come in below consensus as regional shifts drive a short-term decline; mix improving.

title: Margin commentary signals weak near-term
snippet: Management points to pricing pressure and weak margin tailwinds; efficiency initiatives underway.

title: New model sparks optimism
snippet: Early interest in a refreshed model drives showroom traffic and a potential surge in orders.

title: Factory partnership expands
snippet: Company announces partnership expand with a regional supplier to scale production capacity.

title: Regulatory investigation update
snippet: Authorities provide an investigation update on software features; risk contained per company statement.

title: Brokerage upgrade on energy storage
snippet: Analyst upgrade highlights record energy storage installs and long-term growth potential.

title: Autopilot recall notice
snippet: A recall is issued for specific configurations; over-the-air patch reduces loss and service time.

title: Manufacturing expansion plans raised
snippet: Management raise capacity targets for a plant expansion, aiming to improve utilization later this year.

title: Upgrade on storage growth
snippet: Analyst upgrade cites strong growth in energy storage deployments and optimism on pipeline.

title: Recall probe update
snippet: Authorities continue recall investigation; added risk noted; timelines remain uncertain.

title: Deliveries surge ahead of quarter-end
snippet: Regional data point to a surge in orders; mix improving; management optimistic.

title: Factory delay risk
snippet: Suppliers indicate a delay risk at a facility; management expects limited impact.

title: Margin decline amid pricing
snippet: Pricing actions weigh on margin; near-term weak tailwinds offset by efficiency work.

title: Partnership expands on charging
snippet: Company expands partnership on charging standards; win for interoperability.

title: Investigation watch
snippet: Regulators provide investigation update on software features; risk monitored.

title: Broker upgrade on autonomy progress
snippet: Upgrade highlights strong progress; optimism around roadmap despite risks.

title: Loss on recall costs
snippet: Company records a small loss tied to recall costs; remediation underway.
